inpiration.quote: I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by.
inpiration.author: Douglas Adams

inpiration.quote: There is no greater agony than bearing an untold story inside you.
inpiration.author: Maya Angelou

inpiration.quote: What really knocks me out is a book that, when you're all done reading it, you wish the author that wrote it was a terrific friend of yours and you could call him up on the phone whenever you felt like it. That doesn't happen much, though.
inpiration.author: J.D. Salinger

inpiration.quote: We write to taste life twice, in the moment and in retrospect.
inpiration.author: Anais Nin

inpiration.quote: One day I will find the right words, and they will be simple.
inpiration.author: Jack Kerouac

inpiration.quote: Fantasy is hardly an escape from reality. It's a way of understanding it
inpiration.author: Lloyd Alexander

inpiration.quote: And by the way, everything in life is writable about if you have the outgoing guts to do it, and the imagination to improvise. The worst enemy to creativity is self-doubt.
inpiration.author: Sylvia Plath

inpiration.quote: You never have to change anything you got up in the middle of the night to write.
inpiration.author: Saul Bellow
